column4: After sale to Intel  Mobileye's founder raises sights on IPO for OrCam
column5: JERUSALEM With the ink barely dry on the $15 billion sale of his autonomous driving technology firm Mobileye  to Intel   inventive Israeli entrepreneur Amnon Shashua now has his sights set on taking another start-up public by the end of next year.

column4: After sale to Intel  Mobileye's founder raises sights on IPO for OrCam
column5: JERUSALEM  March 30 With the ink barely dry on the $15 billion sale of his autonomous driving technology firm Mobileye to Intel  inventive Israeli entrepreneur Amnon Shashua now has his sights set on taking another start-up public by the end of next year.
